statements: SELECT * FROM recycling_efforts;
SELECT community_name, recycled_materials FROM recycling_efforts;
SELECT recycling_id, recycling_date, impact_score FROM recycling_efforts WHERE impact_score > 50;
SELECT community_name, recycling_date FROM recycling_efforts ORDER BY recycling_date DESC;
SELECT MAX(impact_score) AS max_score FROM recycling_efforts;
SELECT * FROM recycling_efforts WHERE community_name = 'City A' AND recycling_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT recycling_id, community_name, recycling_date FROM recycling_efforts WHERE impact_score > 50 ORDER BY recycling_date DESC;
SELECT recycled_materials FROM recycling_efforts WHERE impact_score < 30 AND community_name = 'City B';
SELECT recycling_id, impact_score FROM recycling_efforts WHERE recycled_materials LIKE '%plastic%' ORDER BY impact_score DESC;
SELECT community_name, COUNT(*) AS total_recycling_efforts FROM recycling_efforts GROUP BY community_name HAVING total_recycling_efforts > 10 ORDER BY total_recycling_efforts DESC;
SELECT * FROM recycling_efforts WHERE materials_type = 'Paper';
SELECT location, weight FROM recycling_efforts WHERE materials_type = 'Plastic' ORDER BY weight DESC;
SELECT community_name, recycling_rate FROM community_stats WHERE recycling_rate > 50;
SELECT * FROM recycling_efforts WHERE materials_type = 'Glass' AND weight >= 100 ORDER BY location ASC;
SELECT community_name, waste_reduction FROM community_stats WHERE waste_reduction < 10 ORDER BY waste_reduction ASC, community_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM recycling_efforts WHERE weight > 100 ORDER BY location ASC;
SELECT location, materials_type, weight FROM recycling_efforts WHERE materials_type = 'Plastic' ORDER BY location DESC;
SELECT community_name, recycling_rate, waste_reduction FROM community_stats WHERE recycling_rate < 0.5 ORDER BY recycling_rate DESC;
SELECT location, materials_type, SUM(weight) AS total_weight FROM recycling_efforts GROUP BY location, materials_type;
SELECT * FROM recycling_efforts WHERE materials_type = 'Glass' AND weight >= 50 ORDER BY weight ASC, location DESC;
SELECT * FROM community_recycling_centers;
SELECT name, location, capacity FROM community_recycling_centers;
SELECT * FROM recycling_materials WHERE material_type='Plastic';
SELECT material_name, material_type FROM recycling_materials WHERE material_type='Glass';
SELECT name, location, capacity FROM community_recycling_centers ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT * FROM community_recycling_centers WHERE location='New York';
SELECT name, location FROM community_recycling_centers WHERE capacity > 10000;
SELECT material_name, material_type FROM recycling_materials ORDER BY material_type DESC;
SELECT cr.name, rs.quantity  FROM community_recycling_centers as cr JOIN recycling_statistics as rs ON cr.id = rs.recycling_center_id;
SELECT cr.name, rm.material_type  FROM community_recycling_centers as cr JOIN recycling_materials as rm ON cr.id = rm.recycling_center_id ORDER BY cr.name ASC;
SELECT * FROM recycling_centers ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT * FROM recycling_bins WHERE material_type='Plastic' AND amount_collected > 100 ORDER BY amount_collected ASC;
SELECT id, location FROM recycling_centers WHERE capacity >= 500 ORDER BY location;

SELECT r.name, r.location, b.material_type, a.collection_date FROM recycling_centers r INNER JOIN recycling_bins b ON r.id = b.center_id INNER JOIN recycling_activities a ON b.id = a.bin_id ORDER BY a.collection_date DESC;

SELECT rr.id AS report_id, ra.activity_type, rr.quantity_collected, rr.impact_metric FROM recycling_reports rr INNER JOIN recycling_activities ra ON rr.activity_id = ra.id WHERE rr.impact_metric = 'Reduced CO2 emissions';
SELECT * FROM recycling_centers WHERE id = 1;
SELECT name, location FROM recycling_centers ORDER BY location DESC;
SELECT * FROM recycling_bins WHERE material_type LIKE '%plastic%' AND amount_collected > 100;

SELECT r.name, ra.collection_date FROM recycling_centers r JOIN recycling_bins b ON r.id = b.center_id JOIN recycling_activities ra ON b.id = ra.bin_id WHERE ra.activity_type = 'pickup' ORDER BY ra.collection_date ASC;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_activities, SUM(quantity_collected) AS total_quantity FROM recycling_reports;
SELECT * FROM Recycling_Companies;
SELECT company_name, location FROM Recycling_Companies ORDER BY company_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM Recycling_Materials WHERE category = 'Plastic';
SELECT event_name, event_date FROM Recycling_Events WHERE event_date > '2022-01-01';

SELECT r.company_name, m.material_name, s.amount_collected FROM Recycling_Companies r JOIN Recycling_Statistics s ON r.company_id = s.company_id JOIN Recycling_Materials m ON s.material_id = m.material_id ORDER BY s.amount_collected DESC;
SELECT * FROM Recycling_Companies;
SELECT company_name, location FROM Recycling_Companies ORDER BY company_name DESC;
SELECT company_name, contact_email FROM Recycling_Companies WHERE location = 'New York';
SELECT event_name, event_date FROM Recycling_Events WHERE location = 'Los Angeles' ORDER BY event_date ASC;

SELECT r.company_name, m.material_name, s.amount_collected FROM Recycling_Companies r INNER JOIN Recycling_Statistics s ON r.company_id = s.company_id INNER JOIN Recycling_Materials m ON s.material_id = m.material_id WHERE s.amount_collected > 1000 ORDER BY s.amount_collected DESC;
